file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 05-40-05-07 - EWIS COMPONENTS IN THE REAR FUSELAGE I LATERAL SIDE - CLEANING/PAINTING

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EWIS COMPONENTS IN THE REAR FUSELAGE I LATERAL SIDE - CLEANING/PAINTING EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to clean the EWIS components at rear fuselage I, lateral side, including rear electronic compartment area. B. Zones: 271/272. C. Zone Boundaries ( AMM MPP 06-41-00/100 AMM MPP 06-41-00/100). D. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY EWIS COMPONENTS IN THE REAR FU- ALL 05-40-05-100-801-A ♦ SELAGE I (LATERAL SIDE) - CLEANING EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 05-40-05 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 05-40-05-100-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. EWIS COMPONENTS IN THE REAR FUSELAGE I (LATERAL SIDE) - CLEANING A. General (1) This procedure obeys the EWIS ICA requirement. (2) This task gives the instructions to do SMRD Task Number: 20-00-00-140-006-A00. (3) You must clean the EWIS components at rear fuselage I, lateral sides, including rear electronic compartment wiring, at zones 271/272, between frame 60 and frame 76. (4) Do not unlace or displace the electrical wiring and components during the cleaning procedure. (5) Do not disconnect electrical connectors during cleaning procedures. If you find contamination, clean only exposed areas. (6) Refer to the Preparation subtask for access panel information. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - AMM MPP 06-41-05/100 - COMPONENT LOCATION AMM TASK 25-51-01-000-801-A/400 BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT LINING - REMOVAL AMM TASK 25-51-01-400-801-A/400 BAGGAGE COMPARTMENT LINING - INSTALLATION AMM TASK 25-81-01-000-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-81-01-000-802-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-81-01-000-803-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-81-01-400-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-81-01-400-802-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-81-01-400-803-A/400 - WM 20-21-00 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION Baggage compartment and rear elec- 271 - tronic compartment - LH Baggage compartment and rear elec- 272 - tronic compartment - RH 272 272DR Fuselage, rear section I - RH D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Standard Ladder To get access to the area EMB-145 - AMM 1285 100-801-A/700 05-40-05 Page 2 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (Continued) ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Standard Vacuum cleaner To clean the area E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Cloth, Lint-Free To clean the area AR available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Rear fuselage I - lateral side I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Put the ladder in position. (2) Get access to the cargo compartment. (3) Open access door 272DR (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100) to get access to the rear electronic compartment. (4) Identify the baggage-compartment lateral internal panels of rear fuselage I, at sub- zone 270 ( AMM MPP 06-41-05/100), that give access to zones 271/272. (5) Remove the baggage-compartment lateral internal panels from rear fuselage I, at sub- zone 270 ( AMM TASK 25-51-01-000-801-A/400) to access zones 271/272. (6) Remove, if necessary, the thermoacoustic insulation from rear fuselage I, at zones 271/272 (AMM TASK 25-81-01-000-801-A/400, AMM TASK 25-81-01-000-802-A/400 or AMM TASK 25-81-01-000-803-A/400, as applicable). J. EWIS Components in the Rear Fuselage I (Lateral Side) - Cleaning (Figure 701) SUBTASK 160-002-A (1) The cleaning procedure of this task is applicable to specified components or assemblies of an area/zone. (2) Do the cleaning procedure as follows: (a) Use a vacuum cleaner and/or a clean and dry cloth to remove the particles from the rear fuselage I area, including rear electronic compartment wiring. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 100-801-A/700 05-40-05 Page 3 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (b) If you find contamination, clean the EWIS components. Refer to WM 20-21-00, Section Cleaning Procedures. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) If you removed the thermoacoustic insulation, install it at zones 271/272 (AMM TASK 25-81-01-400-801-A/400, AMM TASK 25-81-01-400-802-A/400 or AMM TASK 25-81-01-400-803-A/400), as applicable. (2) Install the baggage-compartment lateral internal panels to rear fuselage I, at sub-zone 270 ( AMM TASK 25-51-01-400-801-A/400), related to zones 271/272. (3) Install access door 272DR (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). (4) Remove the ladder. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 100-801-A/700 05-40-05 Page 4 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
